name: Legend (itch)
description:
2020 7DRL

Legend is dungeon crawling roguelike. With a variety of items to master, travel through the dungeon  and face great challenges.

Inspiration from Zelda and Binding of Isaac

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move,
  • Z to aim, then Arrow keys to fire
    • Z to cycle items when aiming
  • X to use item
    • X to cycle items when aiming
    • Z or arrows to confirm

Tips:

  • You can always throw things
  • Vases are for looting
